reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-made and comfortable, with one noting the sequins are not itchy at all. The appearance receives positive feedback, with one customer mentioning it got lots of compliments. The material quality and fit receive mixed reviews - while some find the material good, others say it's not as expected, and some report the dress runs big in size. The stretchiness is also mixed, with some appreciating the nice stretch while others note the skirt has no stretch. The back receives positive feedback for its see-through design, though opinions on its flattering nature are divided. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute ☺️
items.body: Dress fits amazing. I didnt follow the recommended size by Amazon would’ve definitely been too small. I did look at some picture reviews and saw someone that weighs the same as me and went off of that based on body shape and size. Bottom of dress is a little fitted , snug on the thighs, but the upper body is loose not tight at all . Also, I didn’t realize the entire back was mesh so I had to improvise and get some adhesive bra/boob tape so I can wear the outfit without the visual of a bra line. Overall outfit was amazing wore with some shoes from Shein . I am 5ft 3” in height. I weigh 183 pounds. size ordered was a size large. Hope this review helps. Read more
items.author: beyond beauty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it
items.body: I love everything about this dress. It’s short, but stays put even with dancing and lots of movement. People mentioned that it is tight at the bottom, and I think that’s what keeps it from riding up. It was absolutely manageable and had room for my hips. I’m also heavier in my arms and usually nervous about dresses with sleeves not fitting them, but the mesh has tons of stretch. The material held tight to the smaller areas of my frame and stretched where it needed to. I danced hard and nothing broke or unraveled. I love the see through back of this dress, and used some tape on the sides of my chest to make sure everything stayed put without having to wear a bra. I’ll probably repurchase this in another color. I’m 5’4 and 170lbs. Usually wear medium tops, XL bottoms, generally size 10 in dresses, or medium/ large dresses. The size medium of this dress fit me perfectly. Read more
items.author: lisa

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap material
items.body: super cute dress but feels cheap . also runs a bit large so its a little loose. this is more of a one and done situation . just not worth your money. Read more
items.author: Brenna

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars The pictures were cute...
items.body: I wanted to love this dress. It reminded me a lot of the mid-2010s HC dresses we had (my Bachelorette party was a throwback party) so i thought this would be perfect.... the skirt wasn't bad, sizing was accurate. But the top just didnt work. The black squares on the top were very thin, not a dress you can wear a bra with obviously, but definitely cant go without one for it being so thin. The material cuts abruptly at the sides and creates a weird line down the side. I think very specific body types can pull this off? But it definitely wasnt for me Read more
items.author: Brittany

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy dress
items.body: I was so nervous about the fit because of my body type..smaller chest..bigger in the stomach area so I went with a 3XL and it works great! Length is perfect, it's also pretty comfortable! I'm happy with the purchase! I'm 5'7" and about 245 lbs. Read more
items.author: Britany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy & Confident!
items.body: I bought this dress for a night out at Vegas. Let me tell you, it’s amazing!!! It’s comfortable and sexy. I had so many compliments while wearing it. The dress fit as expected. And just like other reviews said, the very bottom seam is pretty snug around the thighs but manageable. There really isn’t any stretch to the skirt. The dress stays in place while walking and if you’ve ever been to Vegas, you do a TON of walking. The top is perfect, and I didn’t need to worry about any surprise exposures as the top stayed in place. 100% recommend this dress! Read more
items.author: Audrey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars No wine stain
items.body: The dress was exactly what I wanted. I wore shapewear underneath, but the fit was great, and I felt comfortable. I thought it was beautiful and I was happy. Then, when I went out with friends, I dumped wine all over the front of my dress, down my legs and into my boots. And the dress still looked great. I was able to go clean myself up (mostly my legs). The dress was still wet from the wine, but you couldn't see it at all. I was able to wrap-up my night with minimal embarrassment and hassle and am SO happy I was wearing this dress. Thank you! Read more
items.author: M

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Short and see through
items.body: This dress looks nice but when you put it on, nothing fits right. First the dress was too short, even with my flat back side there was no way I could walk and this dress not show my butt. Second the material is so thin even with the double layer that you can see through it. Third I love the sparkles but because the material was thin the dress was itchy and moving your arms the sequins rub you raw. Read more
items.author: live2367

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Bronze, Gold, Glitter Gold, Blue, Black, Champagne, Lantern Sleeves Black Black, Red, Lantern Sleeves Black, Lantern Sleeves Black Multi, Lantern Sleeves White Gold, Lantern Sleeves Green, Lantern Sleeves Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
